Text:
War of Antarctica is a Real time strategy game which takes place in Antarctica.
The evil Wild boars are planning to invade Antarctica and the penguins must defend
their country at all costs.

Choose to invade or defend Antarctica.

Features

-2 playable sides
-10 various levels for both sides
-11 controllable units
-Great music
-Blasting sound effects
-Good voice-acting
-Amazing story
-approximately 8 minutes of CGI

www.ortmon.com
